channel.title: [Beta] Armonian - Eco Based
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to Armonian's Advertisement thread!
We're a new server, just starting out!
Server Features: Professional and Friendly staff Many Shops An actual Economy Server And many more!
Our website is located here - http://amornian.x10.mx/
Pictures of the server, but not limited to:
Zgs Spec [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/zgs_zps2f4c6990.png[/img]

item.title: [Beta] Armonian - Eco Based
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

personally i think the dark bow and dragon arrows shouldn’t be in the ranging shop they should be a rare item so like its like 25m for a d bow and players can only get it threw players or drops on monsters and also if i am correct dragon arrows shouldn’t be in the shop to they should be like a rare with more atk bonus then rune throwing knifes because ive found out on some servers rune knifes and d knifes hit the same they are not stronger in anyway which they should be anyway good luck

Read full topic
